index_terms: OFFICE OF ARTS AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the organization of City government; creating an Office of Arts and Cultural Affairs in the Executive Department; abolishing the existing Seattle Arts Commission and creating a new Seattle Arts Commission; transferring some of the functions of the existing Seattle Arts Commission to the Office of Arts and Cultural Affairs and transferring some of its functions to the new Seattle Arts Commission; amending Chapter 3.14 and various other parts of the Seattle Municipal Code in connection therewith; authorizing the transfer of certain positions and incumbents; and repealing sections in chapter 3.56 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
